title: Provisional's
body: 8 wins 2 losses in my provisional's and get placed in b5.... riot please explain

replies.body:
Lower level or first time provisional players will be placed higher on the ladder than people that have had experience. 
Apparently riot thinks that we can climb out of elo hell easier  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
MOAR MOAR MOAR!!!! Ha Ha Ha ... Wait thats not funny ... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

People who've never played ranked have a default ELO of Mid Silver so if they do well in provisionals they'll get placed in Mid Silver.

While people who've played ranked before have ELO based on their performanced.
If you have Bronze ELO you'll be placed in Bronze no matter what you perform in the provisional matches.
s4 last season, 6-4 games got s5

Look up how the provisional system works before complaining.

I and everyone else that knows how it works has already explained it more times than we should have to, to idiots like you.
More people in Challenger  than Master. Pretty interesting
I got places in s4 I was plat 4 last season enjoy the climb bro its not that hard nearly s1 already
